betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Alveary is a customizable multiblock that is a 3x3x3 of alveary blocks with a 3x3 of wooden slabs on the top with a texture being shown on the top layer of the alveary blocks when completed.

At base the alveary has a 10x bonus to your bee's production but what sets it apart are the blocks you can customize it with. There are a variety of blocks which you can place in the alveary to give different affects which are listed in quests after this.

Note that you can't replace the top row of alveary blocks or the mutliblock won't form but you can mix and match which wooden slabs you use.
